pr_title: Map iteration support for ForEach processor

timeline.message: adds map iteration to ForEach processor

timeline.bodyText: Maybe also add a nested for each tests for maps like the existing testNestedForEach() test?
timeline.author: martijnvg

timeline.bodyText: I think we can cast to Map<?, ?> instead? Then the SuppressWarnings can be removed. In order to get the key a cast to String would required, but that shouldn't generate warnings.
timeline.author: martijnvg

timeline.message: fix nested map iteration and add tests
